author: Staff Reporter
text:
Cases were filed against three AIADMK party functionaries on the charges of distributing free T-shirts and saris to voters at Seevalsaragu panchayat in Athoor constituency and also against eight persons including DMK party District Secretary I.P. Senthil Kumar in connection with a clash between AIADMK and DMK cadres over the issue here on Thursday. One person was injured in the clash.

While Election officials filed cases against AIADMK party functionaries, Sempatti police registered cases against DMK functionaries.

The special flying squad seized 40 T-shirts and a car used to transport the goods from two members, Jothi Mayilsamy and Rajendran.

The DMK men complained that the AIADMK functionaries dumped T-shirts and shawls in a car and tried to distribute to voters in Athoor constituency.

District Secretary I.P. Senthil Kumar saw the car with freebies while returning home after taking part in a public meeting at Chithaiyankottai. The DMK men laid a siege to the car and informed the flying squad.

Cadres clash

Meanwhile, AIADMK and DMK cadres clashed with each other. AIADMK functionary Raja was injured. Sempatti police filed cases against eight persons including I.P. Senthil Kumar in this connection.

Meanwhile, the flying squad intensified its surveillance in all the seven assembly segments to prevent distribution of gifts to lure voters.

Special flying squad seized 40 T-shirts and a car used to transport the goods from the cadres
title: 3 AIADMK men booked for distributing gifts
